mapper.select: SELECT qs.fUuid AS 'uuid', qs.fDomain AS 'domain', qs.fPcGroup AS 'pcGroup', qs.fPhoneGroup AS 'phoneGroup', qs.fCreateTime AS 'createTime' FROM t_qz_setting qs WHERE qs.fCrawlerStatus = 'new' OR qs.fCrawlerTime IS NULL OR qs.fCrawlerTime <= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 8 HOUR) ORDER BY qs.fCreateTime DESC limit #{taskNumber}

SELECT COUNT(qk.fIncrease = 0 OR NULL) AS unchangedNum, COUNT(qk.fIncrease <= #{lower} OR NULL) AS downNum, COUNT(qk.fIncrease >= #{upper} OR NULL) AS upNum, COUNT(qk.fAchieveLevel > 0 OR NULL) AS atLeastStandardNum, COUNT(qk.fAchieveLevel = 0 OR NULL) AS neverStandardNum, COUNT(qk.fDifferenceValue <= #{differenceValue} OR NULL) AS closeStandardNum, COUNT(qk.fTodayDifference =0 OR NULL) AS unchangedDifferenceNum, COUNT(qk.fTodayDifference >0 OR NULL) AS upDifferenceNum, COUNT(qk.fTodayDifference <0 OR NULL) AS downDifferenceNum FROM t_qz_keyword_rank_info qk JOIN t_qz_setting qs ON qs.fUuid = qk.fQZSettingUuid JOIN t_customer c ON c.fUuid = qs.fCustomerUuid WHERE 1=1
AND qk.fTerminalType = #{terminalType}
